channel.title: Tug-o-war stunner
channel.description:
this is my first script i made im plankbierdthepirate
[size=20pt]any feedback of it not working please tell me[/size]
Thanks KyleGut3 for the regular tug-o-war script you saved me about 10 minutes of making both stunner and tugger
directions: 1. pull up tug-o-war on neopets 2. start up my script with any other tug o war scripts 3. start scripts 4. click the tug-o-war page 5. watch it go and hopefully get #1

item.title: Tug-o-war stunner
item.dc:creator: @silntkilla silntkilla
item.description:
@silntkilla wrote:

ive been grounded for the whole summer but now im back ive tryed making my own script close to the ones i usualy see and it slows it down sooooo much the farthestyou can get is like lvl 5 or 6 so realy its not worth it[br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2007, 11:32:21 PM[/size][hr][quote=“littlehiggy123, post:3, topic:104284”]how can i make it run with another tug-o-war script because it only runs one for me[/quote]
ill go ahead and make one whole for you all

Read full topic

item.title: Tug-o-war stunner
item.dc:creator: @SturmxHawke SturmxHawke
item.description:
@SturmxHawke wrote:

Maybe if you also put in something that would press the buttons x and c, c and v, v and b, b and n or n and m. That would make it even better. Along with a bitmap checker for the stun combo’s it would be ownage
